languages.text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
languages.original_text: Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(уровень посоха × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и восстанавливая себе <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.

traits.locale_text: The Psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(Psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing the Psyker for <u>Psyker's staff power level</u> wounds. If the Psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the wounded Psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> wounds. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the wounded psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

languages.text: 灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成{uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}。如果灵能者的生命值已满，此能力会治疗灵能者生命值最低的盟友。
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>灵能者法杖力量等级</u>。如果灵能者的生命值已满，此能力会治疗灵能者生命值最低的盟友。

灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成{uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}。如果灵能者的生命值已满，此能力会治疗灵能者生命值最低的盟友。

languages.text: El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y recuperar {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Si el psíquico ya tiene las heridas al máximo, este poder cura en su lugar al aliado del psíquico con el menor número de heridas.
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(nivel de poder del báculo × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y recuperar <u>nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Si el psíquico ya tiene las heridas al máximo, este poder cura en su lugar al aliado del psíquico con el menor número de heridas.

El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y recuperar {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Si el psíquico ya tiene las heridas al máximo, este poder cura en su lugar al aliado del psíquico con el menor número de heridas.

languages.text: 異能者はターゲットの生命力を吸収し、{uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をターゲットに与えるとともに、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を{uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}の分だけ回復する。異能者の傷がすでに最大値の場合、異能者の仲間のうち体力が最も少ない者を回復する。
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: 異能者はターゲットの生命力を吸収し、<u>(異能者の杖熟練度 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>のダメージをターゲットに与えるとともに、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を<u>杖熟練度</u>の分だけ回復する。異能者の傷がすでに最大値の場合、傷を負った異能者の仲間のうち傷が最も少ない者を回復する。

異能者はターゲットの生命力を吸収し、{uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をターゲットに与えるとともに、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を{uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb}の分だけ回復する。異能者の傷がすでに最大値の場合、異能者の仲間のうち体力が最も少ない者を回復する。

languages.text: Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и восстанавливая себе {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(уровень посоха + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.

Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(уровень посоха + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера)</u> урона и восстанавливая себе <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.

Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и восстанавливая себе {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если псайкер обладает полным запасом здоровья, то восстановление направлено на его союзника с наименьшим запасом здоровья.

languages.text: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und den Psioniker um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe der {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} heilt. Sollte der Psioniker bereits volle Wunden haben, heilt diese Kraft stattdessen den Verbündeten des Psionikers mit den wenigsten Wunden.
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm <u>(Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und den Psioniker um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe der <u>Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe</u> heilt. Sollte der Psioniker bereits volle Wunden haben, heilt diese Kraft stattdessen den Verbündeten des Psionikers mit den wenigsten Wunden.

Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und den Psioniker um {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe der {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} heilt. Sollte der Psioniker bereits volle Wunden haben, heilt diese Kraft stattdessen den Verbündeten des Psionikers mit den wenigsten Wunden.

languages.text: Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en se soignant à hauteur de {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures du psyker est déjà pleine, ce pouvoir soigne l'allié qui possède le moins de blessures dans sa réserve.
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.

traits.locale_text: Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de dégâts et en se soignant à hauteur de <u>niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures du psyker est déjà pleine, ce pouvoir soigne l'allié blessé qui possède le moins de blessures dans sa réserve.

Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en se soignant à hauteur de {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures du psyker est déjà pleine, ce pouvoir soigne l'allié qui possède le moins de blessures dans sa réserve.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, hedeften yaşam emer ve {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirken kendisini de iyileştirerek {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeler. Ruhsezerin sağlık puanı zaten tamsa ruhsezer yerine onun en düşük sağlık puanına sahip dost birimi iyileşir.
languages.original_text: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for {uip|Healing|fb5efed90c6442acb6f9c756905072eb} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
